original_text: And he brought back all the goods, and also brought again his brother Lot, and his goods, and the women also, and the people.
korean_text: 모든 빼앗겼던 재물과 자기의 조카 롯과 그의 재물과 또 부녀와 친척을 다 찾아왔더라

sentences.original_text: And he brought back all the goods
and also brought again his brother Lot
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그의 동생 롯을 다시 데려왔으며
